titles: The brides longing for her bride-groomes second comming A sermon preached at the funerall of the right worshipfull, Sir Thomas Crevv, knight, sergeant at law to his maiestie. By the late learned and reverend divine, Rich. Sibs.
author: Sibbes, Richard, 1577-1635.
Hughes, George, 1603-1667, attributed name.
publisher: Printed by E. P[urslow] for E. Langham, in Bambury,
notes: Epistle signed: G.H., i.e. George Hughes?.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
